duties_responsibilities.duty: Track legislative and regulatory issues impacting the health and fitness industry.
Coordinate state lobbying and legislative efforts.
Assist in federal and state-level lobbying.
Communicate state issues to industry membership and provide legislative briefings.
Coordinate testimony for legislative and regulatory bodies.
Aide in drafting legislation, regulatory comments, and federal and state Government Affairs communications.
Build and maintain relationships with industry state alliances and lobbyists.
Generate grassroots advocacy campaigns and promote on digital platforms.

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree required, legislative or government affairs experience preferred.
